about.text1: In 2008 I wrote my first Hello World! I was the head of the press service of the FC 'Sheriff Tiraspol' (the same one that beat in 2021 'Real Madrid' at the Santiago Bernabeu).  I was also responsible for the work of the club website. There I first tried myself as a developer and content manager. In 2018, when the need for IT specialists began to grow, and training became very high, I had the idea to become a front-end developer. The decision was spontaneous. I was 31 at the time and had been a journalist for 12 years. Television, radio, writing press. You can, in my profession I experience everything. And I took on a new challenge.
about.text2: After reading stories about how 30-year-olds become programmers, I realized that I could do it too. As a result, over the course of several years, combining my studies with my main job, I passed:
about.text2_p1: - courses of the school SkillUp Kyiv
about.text3: Now I already have several completed projects and experience of working in a team. Web development has evolved from a hobby into something more. I think it's still ahead. There is only one conclusion - if you want to become a programmer, you will become one. Whether it is difficult, everyone decides for himself.

portfolio.description_1: These projects are made with React.js,

services.websitesInfo: You will receive a full range of website development services for your business.
services.mobileAppInfo: There are plans to improve, technical support and develop mobile applications.
services.supportInfo: Improvement of functionality, performance improvement and adaptation to mobile applications.
